title.rendered: The Club Leather Faced Tub Chair

content.rendered:
The Club Tub Chair is perfectly suited for commercial use, ideal for reception / waiting areas, offices, as well as hospitality and retail environments. 

 

This Real Leather faced tub chair one of the lowest priced Leather Tub Chair that we currently sell. Not only offering great value for money, this chair has been designed to be extremely durable well suited for commercial use.

Here shown in Standard Black Leather with a 10 working day lead time. Other leather faced colours have a 4-5 week lead time. 

If you require delivery sooner, please ask.

These items carry a 3 year guarantee.
